text: Silver Rain is an album by bassist Marcus Miller. It was released in 2005.[ Allmusic Review: Silver Rain] accessed 31 March 2013 ==Track listing== All compositions by Marcus Miller, except as noted. # "Intro Duction" – 0:30 # "Bruce Lee" – 5:23 # "La Villette" – 5:54 # "Behind The Smile" – 6:24 # "Frankenstein" (Edgar Winter) – 6:33 # "Moonlight Sonata" (Ludwig van Beethoven) – 7:38 # "Boogie On Reggae Woman" (Stevie Wonder) – 5:02 # "Paris (Interlude)" – 1:14 # "Silver Rain" – 6:08 # "Make Up My Mind" – 3:42 # "Girls and Boys" (Prince) – 5:36 # "Sophisticated Lady" (Duke Ellington) – 5:23 # "Power of Soul" (Jimi Hendrix) – 6:53 # "Outro
